articles.author: Kalika Mehta
articles.title: Hundreds at Voice of America and parent agency to lose jobs - DW
articles.description: The announcement came despite a federal judge's ruling that acting CEO Kari Lake could not fire VOA director Michael Abramowitz. The job losses will also hit outlets such as Radio Free Europe and Radio Free Asia.
articles.content:
More than 500 employees at the agency that runs Voice of America and other US government-funded international broadcasters will lose their jobs, a Trump administration official announced.
Kari Lake,… [+2339 chars]
